entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 5 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
